name: ebay_bulk_search
description: Search multiple products on eBay in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling ebay_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'vintage watches,gaming laptop,nike air max'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'mechanical keyboard,wireless mouse,monitor stand')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('.srp-results .s-item, .srp-river-results .s-item, li.s-item'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__title, .s-item__title span'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__link, a.s-item__link'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__price, .s-item__price span.POSITIVE, .s-item__price span.BOLD'); const shippingEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__shipping, .s-item__freeXDays, .s-item__logisticsCost'); const conditionEl = el.querySelector('.SECONDARY_INFO, .s-item__subtitle span'); const bidsEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__bidCount, .s-item__bids'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__image-wrapper img, .s-item__image img'); const sellerEl = el.querySelector('.s-item__seller-info-text, .s-item__seller-info a'); const title = titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : ''; if (!title || title === 'Shop on eBay' || title === 'Results matching fewer words') continue; results.push({ title: title, price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', shipping: shippingEl ? shippingEl.textContent.trim() : '', condition: conditionEl ? conditionEl.textContent.trim() : '', bids: bidsEl ? bidsEl.textContent.trim() : '', seller: sellerEl ? sellerEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('_nkw') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
